11#include "audio/utility/channel_mixer.h"
12
13#if defined(WEBRTC_WEBKIT_BUILD)
14#include <cstring>
15#endif
16
17#include "audio/utility/channel_mixing_matrix.h"
18#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
19#include "rtc_base/logging.h"
20#include "rtc_base/numerics/safe_conversions.h"
21
22namespace webrtc {
23
24ChannelMixer::ChannelMixer(ChannelLayout input_layout,
25 ChannelLayout output_layout)
26 : input_layout_(input_layout),
27 output_layout_(output_layout),
28 input_channels_(ChannelLayoutToChannelCount(input_layout)),
29 output_channels_(ChannelLayoutToChannelCount(output_layout)) {
30 // Create the transformation matrix.
31 ChannelMixingMatrix matrix_builder(input_layout_, input_channels_,
32 output_layout_, output_channels_);
33 remapping_ = matrix_builder.CreateTransformationMatrix(&matrix_);
34}
35
36ChannelMixer::~ChannelMixer() = default;
37
38void ChannelMixer::Transform(AudioFrame* frame) {
39 RTC_DCHECK(frame);
40 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(matrix_[0].size(), static_cast<size_t>(input_channels_));
41 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(matrix_.size(), static_cast<size_t>(output_channels_));
42
43 // Leave the audio frame intact if the channel layouts for in and out are
44 // identical.
45 if (input_layout_ == output_layout_) {
46 return;
47 }
48
49 if (IsUpMixing()) {
50 RTC_CHECK_LE(frame->samples_per_channel() * output_channels_,
51 frame->max_16bit_samples());
52 }
53
54 // Only change the number of output channels if the audio frame is muted.
55 if (frame->muted()) {
56 frame->num_channels_ = output_channels_;
57 frame->channel_layout_ = output_layout_;
58 return;
59 }
60
61 const int16_t* in_audio = frame->data();
62
63 // Only allocate fresh memory at first access or if the required size has
64 // increased.
65 // TODO(henrika): we might be able to do downmixing in-place and thereby avoid
66 // extra memory allocation and a memcpy.
67 const size_t num_elements = frame->samples_per_channel() * output_channels_;
68 if (audio_vector_ == nullptr || num_elements > audio_vector_size_) {
69 audio_vector_.reset(new int16_t[num_elements]);
70 audio_vector_size_ = num_elements;
71 }
72 int16_t* out_audio = audio_vector_.get();
73
74 // Modify the number of channels by creating a weighted sum of input samples
75 // where the weights (scale factors) for each output sample are given by the
76 // transformation matrix.
77 for (size_t i = 0; i < frame->samples_per_channel(); i++) {
78 for (size_t output_ch = 0; output_ch < output_channels_; ++output_ch) {
79 float acc_value = 0.0f;
80 for (size_t input_ch = 0; input_ch < input_channels_; ++input_ch) {
81 const float scale = matrix_[output_ch][input_ch];
82 // Scale should always be positive.
83 RTC_DCHECK_GE(scale, 0);
84 // Each output sample is a weighted sum of input samples.
85 acc_value += scale * in_audio[i * input_channels_ + input_ch];
86 }
87 const size_t index = output_channels_ * i + output_ch;
88 RTC_CHECK_LE(index, audio_vector_size_);
89 out_audio[index] = rtc::saturated_cast<int16_t>(acc_value);
90 }
91 }
92
93 // Update channel information.
94 frame->num_channels_ = output_channels_;
95 frame->channel_layout_ = output_layout_;
96
97 // Copy the output result to the audio frame in |frame|.
98 memcpy(
99 frame->mutable_data(), out_audio,
100 sizeof(int16_t) * frame->samples_per_channel() * frame->num_channels());
101}
102
103} // namespace webrtc
